ygData.subject: Re: Best wizard equipment ! !   SPOILER
ygData.msgSnippet: Updateing the list a little.  Also  I know the location of the glowing black stone.  I will disclose the location to the group as soon as I obtain it.  If you
ygData.messageBody:
Updateing the list a little. Also I know the location of the glowing black
stone. I will disclose the location to the group as soon as I obtain it. If you
are on Fennin Ro, you are more than welcome to join me in obtaining this item.
You need a party of about 4 level 10ish people to get it, and its not camped. (of
course I want the first one though ;)

Cheers
Malkin


Spoiler Below

1 hand slot black tome +30 mana +4 int (najena)
2 hand slot glowing black stone +9 int and +10 magic resistence (??)
neck Black iron medalion +3 int +3 wis (clan runny eye)
robe Robe of oracle +5 int +5wiz +25 mana (lower guk)
**Head Rubed Circlet AC4 Wis +4 Int +4
hands Dusty gloves +25 mana (estate of unrest)
2 x Wrist Polished Bone Bracers +3 Int +3 Wis (maze)
2 x Earings Batskull Earrings +5 int (??)
l2 x ring ring of goblin lords +3 int +3 str (soulsek)
arms hollow bone bracers +15 mana +7 magic resistance ac 6 (najena)
shoulders embroidered black cape +20 mana +15 hp ac 4 (??)
**belt Braided Cinch Cord Int +4 Int +8 HP AC 2
feet jurnajman boots permanent SOW? (najena)
**Face Sheer bone mask AC3 Int +3
